text: Villentrois-Faverolles-en-Berry is a commune in the Indre department in central France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Villentrois (the seat) and Faverolles-en-Berry.Arrêté préfectoral 7 December 2018, p. 28 ==See also== *Communes of the Indre department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Indre
title: Villentrois-Faverolles-en-Berry
